922160.name: Torn - Official Soundtrack
922160.description:
Composed, orchestrated and conducted by Garry Schyman (BioShock franchise, Middle-earth franchise) and fully remastered for the OST, the Torn soundtrack is an original album crafted for the Torn universe. A fascinating score for a mysterious game, the Torn soundtrack conveys equally mysterious tones. © 2018 Aspyr Media, Inc. All rights reserved.

16. Discovery of Distant Past (1:06)
